actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to investigate the involvement, if any, of the U. S. Government in the overthrow of the Allende government in Chile.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the House that the House Foreign Affairs Committee shall undertake immediately to hold hearings for the purpose of investigating the involvement, if any, of the United States Government in the overthrow of the Chilean Government of President Salvador Allende in September 1973.

titles.title: Resolution to investigate the involvement, if any, of the U. S. Government in the overthrow of the Allende government in Chile.
